text: Shim Changmin (born 18 February 1988) is a Korean singer, songwriter, model and actor. He was the youngest member of the boy band TVXQ. He started with TVXQ in 2003. Shim was born and grew up in Seoul, South Korea. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Actors from Seoul Category:Living people Category:SM Entertainment artists Category:South Korean singer-songwriters
title: Changmin
